name: search_project
description:
Search project files by content pattern (grep-style regex), file name pattern (glob), modification date, or file size. Important glob pattern notes:

1. Directory Traversal:
   * `**` matches zero or more directory levels
   * ONLY use `**` between directory separators
   * Cannot use `**` within a filename

2. File Matching:
   * `*` matches any characters within a filename or directory name
   * Use `*` for matching parts of filenames

3. Common Patterns:
   * `docs/*` - files IN docs directory only
   * `docs/**/*` - files in docs SUBDIRECTORIES only
   * `docs/*|docs/**/*` - files in docs AND its subdirectories
   * `src/*.ts|src/**/*.ts` - TypeScript files in src and subdirectories
   * `**/*.test.ts` - test files at any depth

4. Pattern Components:
   * `**/dir/*` - files in any 'dir' directory
   * `path/to/**/file.ts` - specific file at any depth
   * `**/*util*.ts` - files containing 'util' at any depth

Use search_project when you don't know exact file paths. For known paths, use request_files instead.
author: BB Team
